After 50 years of China-Japan economic ties, what comes next? â€“ World Policy Conference

Many regard the 1972 normalization of diplomatic ties between Japan and China as historically important, since it restructured the international order that had been divided by the Communist camp during the Cold War. But it also had a great impact on the global economic structure, laying the groundwork for Chinaâ€™s reform and opening-up. Read the entire article on the site of the Japan

President Biden announced the decision before the start of a G7 summit meeting in Germany.

items.title:
The U.S., South Korea, Japan, Australia and Canada will participate in joint missile defense drills this August.

One expert told NK News that these exercises tend to "assume that [they are] against North Koreaâ€™s missile attacks."
items.content_html:
Kazuto Suzuki@KS_1013

NK NEWS@nknewsorg The U.S., South Korea, Japan, Australia and Canada will participate in joint missile defense drills this August. One expert told NK News that these exercises tend to "assume that [they are] against North Koreaâ€™s missile attacks."

Australia and Canada to join US-ROK-Japan missile detection drills: Sources | NK News

Australia and Canada will join planned ballistic missile defense drills involving the U.S., South Korea and Japan later this year, informed sources told NK News, in what one expert said are exercises that prepare in part for the possibility of North Korean attacks. The Pacific Dragon drills will take place in waters off Hawaii in [â€¦]

Article URL: https://www.nknews.org/2022/06/australia-and-canada-to-join-us-rok-japan-missile-detection-drills-sources/
